cause.description:
For people who are entirely fed up with listening to Al Gore and the other liberal pansies who have nothing better to do than yell at you for not recycling your cans and not using proper gardening techniques. Let the glaciers melt, who's it gonna affect? Canadians that's who, and nobody cares about them anyway. Al Gore's a communist.
1. Al Gore is a communist.
2. Al Gore is an opportunist.
3. Al Gore is Mao Zedong.
cause.mission: destroy the planet by the time the democrats regain control of the white house
cause.name: Foster Global Warming
